program: Wanna Lose This Beer Belly - Fat Loss & Core Strength
author: Victor Sol√© Ferioli
target_population: Adults with 5-15kg to lose, committed to nutrition and training
minimum_duration_note: Fat loss takes time; 6 weeks is minimum, most need 12-24 weeks

critical_disclaimers.spot_reduction_myth: Core exercises do NOT burn belly fat. Fat loss is systemic. Abs are revealed through nutrition (80%) and training (20%).

non_negotiables.details: Calculate TDEE, subtract 300-500 calories, track intake

non_negotiables.recommendation: Max 2 drinks per week during program
non_negotiables.reason: Alcohol = 7 cal/g, impairs fat metabolism 24-48 hours, increases visceral fat

non_negotiables.rule: Hit targets 80% of time, don't compensate for bad meals by starving

why_beer_belly_is_real: 7 calories per gram (almost as much as fat at 9 cal/g)
Body prioritizes alcohol metabolism, stops burning fat
Lowers inhibitions for poor food choices

weekly_schedule.sunday: Rest OR optional 30-45 min steady cardio

weekly_structure.focus: Establish baseline, learn movements, initiate deficit
Increase volume, reduce rest, intensify calorie burn

weekly_structure.workout_b: Interval Cardio + Rotational Core (woodchoppers, bear crawls)
Sustained Cardio (20 min) + Core Flow (4 rounds)
Grand Finale Circuit (5 rounds) + Core Burnout

week_3_check_in.lifestyle: Workouts completed (__/12), Alcohol reduction, Sleep improvement

week_6_final.measurements: Weight (-3 to 6kg), Waist (-2 to 5cm), Photos comparison
week_6_final.lifestyle: Workouts completed (__/24, goal 20+), Alcohol change, Energy/sleep improvement

sleep_targets.environment: Dark, cool room, no screens 1 hour before
sleep_targets.why_it_matters: Poor sleep = increased cortisol = belly fat storage, insulin resistance, poor food choices

stress_management.principle: Chronic stress = elevated cortisol = belly fat

check_after_3_weeks: Actually in calorie deficit? Track honestly for 7 days
Tracking weight correctly? Same time daily, focus on weekly average
Drinking alcohol? Even 3-4 drinks/week stalls progress
Sleeping enough? <6 hours impairs fat loss significantly
Chronic stress? Elevated cortisol prevents fat loss
Overtraining? Too much exercise without recovery = cortisol spike
Medical factors? Thyroid, insulin resistance, medications - see doctor

post_program_options.option_1: Repeat with progression (increase weights, reduce rest, beat numbers)
post_program_options.option_2: Transition to muscle building (hypertrophy, slight surplus)
post_program_options.long_term_reality: Visible abs = year-round commitment, lifestyle not temporary fix, gets easier with habit

critical_exercise_notes.core_work_purpose: Builds muscle under fat, does NOT burn belly fat
critical_exercise_notes.anti_rotation_exercises: Pallof press, bird dog, dead bug - prevent spine rotation, functional strength
critical_exercise_notes.hiit_purpose: Maximum calorie burn, improved insulin sensitivity, metabolic boost
critical_exercise_notes.full_body_resistance: Builds muscle (increases metabolism), burns calories, improves insulin sensitivity
